original_text: It is like God baptized all of them in the cloud and in the sea. In that way, they became people who followed Moses.
korean_text: 모세에게 속하여 다 구름과 바다에서 세례를 받고

sentences.original_text: It is like God baptized all of them
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 하나님께서 그들 모두에게 세례를 주신 것과 같습니다

sentences.original_text: in the cloud and in the sea
they became people who followed Moses
